definition: to develop/to evolve/to practice/to perform/to play/to act
to play music/to achieve/to present a memorial to the emperor (old)

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: I would guess that, in that situation where a percussion player misses a crash.
sentences.chinese: 我想如果一名打擊樂演奏者錯過了該敲的點。

sentences.english: It with make the sound machine pedal similar, is good assistant of necessary performer.
sentences.chinese: 它與制音器踏板一樣，是演奏者不可或缺的好助手。

sentences.english: Singers and instrumentalists have to be able to get every note perfectly in tune.
sentences.chinese: 歌手和樂器演奏者必須使所有的音符完全相同協調。

sentences.english: Perching on the periphery of every orchestra is a percussion player.
sentences.chinese: 坐在每支管絃樂隊外圍的是打擊樂演奏者。

sentences.english: Who are the singers and fiddlers?
sentences.chinese: 誰是歌手和小提琴演奏者？

sentences.english: At this point the players have to modulate from E to G.
sentences.chinese: 這時演奏者必須由E調轉到G調。

sentences.english: Moreover, the self-sensational conciousness of which players have on the musical works' dynamics should also be considered.
sentences.chinese: 此外，還要結合演奏者對作品力度的自我感覺意識。

sentences.english: Many string players don’t know the difference between playing and practicing.
sentences.chinese: 許多絃樂演奏者不知道演奏及練習的分別。

sentences.english: It contains the variable melody and abundant emotion of instrumentalist.
sentences.chinese: 它包含了多變的旋律和演奏者豐富的感情。

sentences.english: The most common kind of busker plays a guitar.
sentences.chinese: 最常見的街頭藝人是吉他演奏者。

sentences.english: He is a composer and improviser.
sentences.chinese: 他是一個作曲家和即興演奏者。
他是一位完美的即興演奏者。

sentences.english: The crazy jazzman gazed at the blaze on the razor with amazement.
sentences.chinese: 瘋狂爵士音樂演奏者驚愕地盯着剃刀上白斑。

sentences.english: Often the key will be considered by the players as if played in standard tuning.
sentences.chinese: 通常演奏者在根音上把它看作與標調一樣。

sentences.english: Early performers of music were popular and respected.
sentences.chinese: 早期的音樂演奏者是很受大衆喜愛和尊敬的。

sentences.english: The crazy jazzman gazed at the blaze on the razor with amazement.
sentences.chinese: 瘋狂的爵士音樂演奏者驚愕地盯着剃刀上的白斑。

definition: to perform on a musical instrument
part (in multi-part instrumental or choral music), such as the soprano part or bass part
